steps.title: How to Remove Watermarks from {{FileformatCap}} Files in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** makes it easy to erase watermarks from your business documents. Add our library to your {{ProgLang}} project and follow these steps:
content.step_1: Start by creating a {{TextWatermarkerBold}} object with your {{FileformatCap}} file. You can use a file path or a stream as input.
content.step_2: Use {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} to filter which watermarks you want to remove. You can search by text, image, or formatting. The more details you give, the more accurate your search will be.
content.step_3: Go through the found watermarks and remove the ones you don’t need from the document.
content.step_4: Once finished, save the cleaned document as a file or stream.

more_features.title: Efficient Watermark Removal with {{ProgLang}} in {{ProgLang}}
more_features.description: Our {{ProgLang}} API helps you quickly remove watermarks from PDFs and office files, keeping your documents clean and original.

feature_1.title: Accurate Watermark Deletion
feature_1.content: The {{ProgLang}} API lets you remove watermarks without damaging your document’s layout or quality. It’s designed for developers who need reliable results.

feature_2.title: Remove Watermarks in Bulk
feature_2.content: Easily clear watermarks from many files at once. This is perfect for companies that need to process lots of documents quickly and securely.

feature_3.title: Advanced Editing for Watermarks
feature_3.content: Use advanced options to fine-tune or edit watermarks before removing them. This helps you keep your documents looking professional and safe.

code_1.title: Remove text watermark from Excel
code_1.content: This example shows how to delete text watermarks with special formatting in Excel files.
